title: Midnight Ride
description: * * * * * War * * * * *  This girl is sweet, but she doesn’t belong here. I need to protect her. I need to keep her safe. I’ll take her on a run.A midnight ride. Then I’ll take her home.  * * * * * Poison * * * * * I’m out with my girls to have some fun. Why not stop at the Dreamhole. Just cause it’s owned by the rival MC don’t mean anything. They don’t call me Poison because I’m sweet. It will be a thrill and it’s crazy, but I don’t care. I can take care of myself. We will have some fun and take a midnight ride. Then I’ll disappear. Nobody will ever know! Really, what can it hurt?  Welcome to War’s and Poison’s story.Please note that this story is full of action, violence, dirty talking bad boy bikers, slang, romance, steamy scenes, and HEA.
author: P.T. Macias
